meanings.definition: Constituting number thirty in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: Her thirtieth birthday party was a joyous occasion.
meanings.sent2: The thirtieth book on the shelf was her favorite novel.
meanings.sent3: He felt like the thirtieth wheel on their outing.
meanings.sent4: The thirtieth step of the staircase creaked under his weight.
meanings.sent5: The thirtieth floor of the building offered a breathtaking view of the city.

meanings.sent1: She ate a thirtieth of the cake at the party.
meanings.sent2: The thirtieth of the month marked the end of the pay period.
meanings.sent3: Finding the thirtieth piece of the puzzle was a relief.
meanings.sent4: Each student received a thirtieth of the total candy.
meanings.sent5: The thirtieth of the pie was reserved for her grandmother.

meanings.sent1: Her birthday fell on the thirtieth of June.
meanings.sent2: The thirtieth in line was the last to board the bus.
meanings.sent3: He always forgets the thirtieth day of the month.
meanings.sent4: The thirtieth in the queue won a special prize.
meanings.sent5: On the thirtieth of December, they celebrate the year's end.
